summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4015 for the improvement of Holly Street from Rainier Avenue to Seward Park Avenue; by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 48693, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
